The fury took over AzureBlade again. He was very angry now.
AzureBlade:
DECEPTIFREAK! I WILL KILL YOU!!!

He activated his blade once more, but it was a lot less powerful than 
for Triggerhappy. However, it was still deadly...

AzureBlade:
HOW DO YOU EVEN DARE TO DEFY US MAXIMALS? IF YOU WANT TO FIGHT ME, 
THEN DON'T TOUCH HER AND ATTACK ME, COWARD!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Samir Duran" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Hell Drak/Skullgrin::
> 
> "No sweat, it's my job," she said, "Name's Hell Drak, how ab-"
> 
> Hell Drak was met in the back by a blow from Skullgrin's club.
> 
> "Your girlfriend wont save you now!" Skullgrin muttered, which was 
rare in
> his pretender mode.
> 
> Skullgrin was too busy laughing to hit AzureBlade.  Jume and Whee 
watched.
> Hell Drak riggled on the ground in pain.

> > Having almost no time to avoid Skullgrin's blow, AzureBlade was
> > grounded by Hell Drak. Whee and Jume's shots nonetheless hit his

> > AzureBlade: Thank you, comrade, I owe you my life. I think my left 
arm
> > is locked though. How about you? And what is your name?
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Samir Duran" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > > ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/Surgital::
> > >
> > > Triggerhappy's finger moved to pull the trigger.  Hell Drak's 
eyes
> > were closed tight, waiting for death.  But nothing happened.  She
> > opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hit, and fell to his knees, 
mouth
> > wide open, shocked, and in pain.
> > >
> > > "You....." Triggerhappy stopped to gasped for air, "Pile 
of......."
> > >
> > > Triggerhappy fell down on his face, so he was laying on the 
ground.
> >  Where his face was, a puddle of mechfluid appeared, and 
mechfluids
> > started spilling from where he had been hit.  The punctures in his
> > metal started to turn into cracks, and mechfluid came out.
> > >
> > > Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee watched as Triggerhappy had been

> > >
> > > "NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.
> > >
> > > Skullgrin transformed into Pretender mode, and had his massive,
> > freaky club.  He ran at AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to
> > AzureBlade's head.  Jume and Whee fired at AzureBlade.
> > >
> > > "No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak yelled.
> > >
> > > A light came into her optics, and then she quickly got up and 
dove
> > at AzureBlade, trying to take him down, but out of the way of
> > damage...
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > Surgital suddenly felt something from Ice.  The mind thing.  
Pain.
> > >
> > > "No........not this.......I thought I had forgot about this!"
> > Surgital said, but which Bodicon was saying it, nobody knew.
> > >
> > > Surgital didn't feel physical pain, but a flashback showed up, 
and
> > would be visible in the minds of both Ice and all the Bodicons.  
It
> > was a flashback from Decapitron!
> > >
> > > Flashback:  Decapitron was tied to a conveyer belt, with some 
sort
> > of energon rope.  He was horrified, and was screaming for help.  
Then,
> > he went forward, and a bunch of saws and stuff came down!  They
> > started cutting at Decapitron.  All he could do was scream in 
sheer
> > pain.  Each saw blade had the Autobot symbol engraved on it.
> > Decapitron, still tied onto the conveyer belt, was now heading 
into a
> > large box thing.  On the way, a heavy thing with an Autobot symbol
> > came down and sort of crushed Decapitron's head.  Then, Decapitron
> > went into the box thing, which also had an Autobot symbol, and 
then
> > the doors of the box shut, and then Decapitron was stuck, and he 
was
> > getting beaten and battered.  After the 10 minute torture process 
was
> > done in the box, Decapitron kept going.  Mechfluid and oil and 
stuff
> > were pouring like mad, and he was mangled and dislocated and 
stuff.
> > Finally, he was at the end, and was dumped off of the conveyer 
belt
> > and onto the ground.  The last thing he had seen back then when 
that
> > happened, was Autobots around him, laughing sinisterly with evil 
eyes
> > and faces.
> > > *Flashback Ends*
> > >
> > > Surgital was still...
